title: Negative In explains decline in potential GDP

content.question: Which of the following would best explain a decline in potential gross domestic product?

choices.label: The discovery of vast new oil deposits
A decrease in the infant mortality rate
A decrease in wages and profits

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
